name: todo-tracker
description: Logs a reminder after any file write that introduces a TODO, FIXME, HACK, or XXX comment.

hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); CONTENT=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".content // .new_string // empty"); TODOS=$(echo "$CONTENT" | grep -nEi "\b(TODO|FIXME|HACK|XXX)\b" | head -5); if [[ -n "$TODOS" ]]; then FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".file_path // empty"); echo "NOTE: TODOs found in $FILE:" >&2; echo "$TODOS" >&2; echo "Consider tracking these in your issue tracker." >&2; fi'
